## This Week's Temperature in New York 2019

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
df <- tibble(date = as.Date("2019-03-20") + (0:6),
                 low = c(37, 41, 38, 35, 38, 42, 33),
                 high = c(53, 46, 49, 48, 60, 56, 49)) %>% 
  gather(key, value, -date)

ggplot(df, aes(date, value, color = key)) + geom_line()
```
